In the last part theyre cheating and sending him videos of it saying they may get addicted and not come back, but theyre lying and in the last page theyre talking about how good the sex was when they did suddenly come back (as in come back to the uncle); meanwhile the girls in class are talking about how the uncle has gotten tan and buff (to compete with the younger guys his slut neices are fucking). So the three of them are together but the girls will keep cheating as some twisted form of love to invigorate the uncle. Hed be better off without them but hes addicted to them unfortunately. Pretty ridiculous that the girls keep professing their love though, he should show them what it feels like and ntr them instead, itd be nice to see them feel jealousy themselves, and to see them feel guilt.
